ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: CEOS WGISS Integrated Catalog (CWIC)
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: CWIC provides an OGC CSW 2.0.2 - compliant access point for major CEOS agency catalog systems.

ows:Keywords.ows:Keyword: Committee on Earth Observation Satellites - CEOS
CEOS Working Group on Information Systems and Services - CEOS WGISS
OGC Catalogue Service for Web - CSW
Center for Spatial Information Science and Systems - CSISS

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This document describes the exceptions which may be returned to the user client.
This report addresses the difference among the CWIC data providers with regard to the search criteria and other features, and also present the recommendations for each data provider.
